Module com.example.battleship
Package com.example.battleship.Model.Game

Interface IGame

All Known Implementing Classes:
Game
public interface IGame
Defines the core behaviors required for any Battleship game implementation. Provides methods for turn management, ship placement, fleet handling, and board interaction.

  • Method Details

    • generateFleet

      void generateFleet()
      Generates and automatically places the full fleet of ships onto the board.

    • placeShip

      void placeShip(IShip ship) throws InvalidPositionException
      Attempts to manually place a ship on the board.
      Parameters:
      ship - the ship to place
      Throws:
      InvalidPositionException - if the ship placement is invalid

    • playTurn

      boolean playTurn(Board board, Human player, int row, int col) throws InvalidShotException
      Executes a single turn of the game by processing a shot fired at a specific board coordinate.
      Parameters:
      board - the board where the shot is fired
      player - the player performing the shot
      row - target row
      col - target column
      Returns:
      true if the shot hit a ship, allowing the player to shoot again
      Throws:
      InvalidShotException - if the shot is repeated or invalid

    • advanceTurn

      void advanceTurn()
      Advances the turn to the next player.

    • isGameOver

      boolean isGameOver()
      Indicates whether the game has concluded.
      Returns:
      true if the game is over

    • getMachineBoard

      Board getMachineBoard()
      Returns the game board.
      Returns:
      the board instance

    • getCurrentPlayer

      Object getCurrentPlayer()
      Returns the player whose turn is currently active.
      Returns:
      the active player

    • getPlayers

      List<Object> getPlayers()
      Retrieves all players currently participating in the game.
      Returns:
      a list of players

    • printFleetCoordinates

      void printFleetCoordinates()
      Prints the board coordinates of every ship in the fleet.

    • getMachineFleet

      Returns the list of ships currently placed on the board.

      the list of ships
